"ダーカーがいくら強くなろうが

"I don't believe for a second that beating this so-called Goddess of Demise is beyond us."
"No matter who our enemy is, I'll fight them with all my strength."
"That Shiva is just playing with us. We musn't get complacent."
"We'll beat her. Whatever it takes."
"Oh, it's you. It's all over, then?"
"The [Profound Darkness] was the source of all Darkers. Now that it's been destroyed, no more Darkers will be created, right?"

"So all we have to do now is clean up what's left...
Yes, not much longer now..."
